product_name: Canari Alpine Bike Jersey - Women's - 2011 Closeout
long_description: Continue to log miles on your bike even in cool weather. The Canari Alpine women's bike jersey supplies lightweight, long-sleeve coverage that protects against the chill without letting you overheat. Polyester fabric wicks away moisture and dries quickly, keeping you cool and dry while working hard. Fabric provides UPF 30 sun protection, shielding skin from harmful ultraviolet rays. Partial front-zip opening allows immediate ventilation. 3 rear pockets keep cycling accessories handy for easy retrieval as you ride. Elastic at sleeves and bottom hem keep the Canari Alpine women's bike jersey comfortably in place. Closeout.
short_description: Continue to log miles on your bike even in cool weather. The Canari Alpine women's bike jersey supplies lightweight, long-sleeve coverage that protects against the chill without letting you overheat.
